tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ManuscriptFeedback (
    manuscript_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reviewer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    comment_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE reviewer_feedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    manuscript_id UUID,
    reviewer_id UUID,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE manuscript (
    manuscript_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    author TEXT,
    publication_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE reviewer (
    reviewer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    expertise TEXT,
    affiliation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
   feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   reviewer_id INT NOT NULL,
   manuscript_id INT NOT NULL,
   feedback_text TEXT,
   feedback_date DATE NOT NULL,
   FOREIGN KEY (reviewer_id) REFERENCES reviewers(reviewer_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (manuscript_id) REFERENCES manuscripts(manuscript_id)
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
   comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   manuscript_id INT NOT NULL,
   commenter_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   comment_text TEXT,
   comment_date DATE NOT NULL,
   FOREIGN KEY (manuscript_id) REFERENCES manuscripts(manuscript_id)
);

CREATE TABLE manuscripts ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  title VARCHAR(255), 
  author VARCHAR(255), 
  abstract TEXT, 
  submission_date DATE 
 );

CREATE TABLE feedbacks ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  manuscript_id INT, 
 reviewer_id INT, 
 rating INT, 
 comment TEXT, 
 feedback_date DATE 
 );

CREATE TABLE comments ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  manuscript_id INT, 
 reviewer_id INT, 
 comment_text TEXT, 
 comment_date DATE 
 );
